creator: liu_xp2003@sina.com
text:
Because one machine has its capacity limitation. I want to use Synchronizing Timer to run more than 5000 threads current testing by two or three JMeter servers.
Latest JMeter version still not support Synchronizing multiple jmeter at same time.

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Hello,
This is a documented limitation :

http://jmeter.apache.org/usermanual/component_reference.html#Synchronizing_Timer
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Synchronizing timer blocks only within one JVM, so if using Distributed testing ensure you never set "Number of Simultaneous Users to Group by" to a value superior to the number of users of its containing Thread group considering 1 injector only. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

We don't plan to make this feature available cross jvm as it would not scale well.
Ask on mailing list , you may get ideas on doing what you want differently.
